What is Isha Kriya?

Rooted in the timeless wisdom of the yogic sciences, Isha Kriya is a simple yet potent process created by Sadhguru.

Daily practice of Isha Kriya brings health, dynamism, peace and wellbeing.

This meditation can be learned in one session and requires an investment of 12 to 18 minutes per day. It has the potential to transform the life of anyone who is willing to incorporate it into their everyday life.

  • Powerful tool to cope with the hectic pace of modern life.
  • Easy to fit into daily life.
  • No previous experience of yoga is necessary.
  • Can even be done seated in a chair.
